description:
In the process of investigating Director Shindou`s murder, Nishinosono and Saikawa learn the details of Shiki`s multiple personalities and the murder of her parents that took place 15 years ago. The two of them try to figure out what she was thinking in order to find a clue.  In doing so, Nishinosono is forced to confront her own past.
Source: crunchyroll
